DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare physical activity behaviour of rheumatoid arthritis patients with healthy matched controls.
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Behavior of Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients and Healthy Controls
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria (RA patients): Rheumatoid arthritis Functional classes I, II and III Age 40 to 80 years Stable disease activity Stable DMARDS last 3 months Exclusion Criteria (RA patients): Functional classes IV Inflammatory flare
